author: spideysimp
description: Returns a random HOI 4 leader. Eventually, filters will be added, but for now, it's just all of them. Part of this cog's functionality is that it shows a picture of the leader of the country it generates. That includes one man who is.... His initials are A.H. Don't use if that distresses you!
install_msg: Thank you for installing HOI 4 Random! Get started with '[p]load hoi4random', then '[p]help Hoi4Random'
